trans-unit.source: Represents the `Base64` decoding transform as defined in Section 6.6.2 of the XMLDSIG specification.
Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> object when you need to sign the raw data associated with the encoded content of an element.

The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> object is defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigBase64TransformUrl> field.
For more information about the `Base64` decoding transform, see Section 6.6.2 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform"></xref> class.

Returns an XML representation of the parameters of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform"></xref> object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG `<Transform>` element.

A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform"></xref> object in an XMLDSIG `<Transform>` element.
Returns the output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform"></xref> object.
The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
The output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform"></xref> object.
Returns the output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform"></xref> object of type <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref>.
The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
The type of the output to return.
<xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref> is the only valid type for this parameter.
The output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform"></xref> object of type <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref>.
The type parameter is not a object.

Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.LoadInput(System.Object)"></xref> method of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform"></xref> object.
The valid input types to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> are <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.

An array of valid input types for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform"></xref> object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.LoadInput(System.Object)"></xref> method of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform"></xref> object.

Parses the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> object as transform-specific content of a `<Transform>` element; this method is not supported because the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform"></xref> object has no inner XML elements.
This method is not supported because the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> object has no inner XML elements.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> object to load into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform"></xref> object.
Loads the specified input into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform"></xref> object.
The type of the input object must be one of the types in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.InputTypes%2A> property.
The input to load into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform"></xref> object.
The obj parameter is a and it is `null`.

Gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.GetOutput"></xref> methods of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform"></xref> object.
<xref:System.IO.Stream> is the only valid output type for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform> object.

An array of valid output types for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform"></xref> object; only objects of one of these types are returned from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform.GetOutput"></xref> methods of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform"></xref> object.
